segments.text: Why do you want to be a stewardess ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have always enjoyed flying . And I am good with people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you handle flying for 24 hours straight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I can adjust to anything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am also calm under pressure and trained in first aid .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . It has always been my dream to be a stewardess .
segments.speaker: S2
